Greetings! I'm a bioinformatician in the making. I delve into the fascinating world of bacteria-phage relationships. My current obsession? Understanding the the biology of these tiny organisms. I'm especially intrigued by *B. tequilensis* EA-CB0015 phenotypical variants (apparently orchestrated by phages) and eager to unravel the mystery behind genes in bacteriophages.
:::
